DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to estimate the diagnostic accuracy of a combined biomarker test (including NMDA-Receptor fragments [NR2-peptide] and Glial fibrillary acidic protein) used to differentiate between cerebral ischemia and intracerebral hemorrhage in patients with acute hemispheric stroke.
DOC.brief_title: Biomarker for Rapid Diagnosis of Hemispheric Stroke
DOC.criteria: hemiparesis at least one sign of cortical involvement (e.g., aphasia, neglect, gaze deviation, reduced level of consciousness) hospital admission within 4.5 hours after symptom onset stroke/TIA within the last 3 months traumatic brain injury within the last 3 months history of brain tumor
